example.eg: She struck the match to light the fire.
Are you going to the match this Saturday?
example.egtrans: 这个星期六你去看足球比赛吗？

example.eg: In this game, you need to match each card with another card with the same design.
example.egtrans: 在这个游戏里，你需要把每张牌与另一张同花色的牌配在一起。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…与…搭配起来, 使…与…相称, 使…与…相配

example.eg: You did a good job getting all the furnishings in this room to match the wallpaper so well.
example.egtrans: 这个房间里的装饰与墙纸搭配得很好，你做得真不错。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 和…相称, 和…相配, 和…相适合

example.eg: Do my clothes match?
The two teams are a good match, and it should be an exciting game.
It's good that they are going into business - those two are a good match.
example.egtrans: 他们一起下海经商真是好事，俩人是很合拍的组合。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相似的事物或人, 组合，配对

example.eg: I'm pleased Alex and Sally got together at last; they are such a good match.
example.egtrans: 亚历克斯和萨利终于在一起了，我真高兴，他俩可相当般配。

example.eg: In this fairy tale, the king is desperate to find a match for his daughter.
The police found a match for the fingerprints in their database of suspects.
This key matches this lock.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与...相吻合, 与...相一致, 与...匹配

example.eg: If the players can match their previous performance, they'll win this game easily.
example.egtrans: 如果球员们能够达到之前的表现水平，那就能轻松拿下这场比赛了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 敌得过, 比得上, 符合，达到

example.eg: Do my shoes match my shirt?
In the tournament, the team was matched with a very difficult opponent.
The man's anger matched his wife's.
example.egtrans: 那个男人和他妻子同样愤怒。

example.eg: It can be hard for partners to get along when their political views don't match up.
The computer will check to see if anyone's interests match up with yours.
My mother's chicken soup was the best; mine can never match up.
example.egtrans: 我妈做的鸡汤最棒，我做的怎么都比不上。

dsense.name: match up to [sth/sb]
dsense.guideword: UK, figurative, informal (be as good as)

example.eg: Sadly, the reality of modelling did not match up to Tracy's dreams.
example.egtrans: 遗憾的是，真实的模特职涯与特雷西的梦想千差万别。

example.eg: It was a match made in heaven, and they lived happily ever after.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 天作地合的一对, 天生一对
完美匹配, 相得益彰

example.eg: Watching a boxing match on TV is a poor substitute for seeing it in person.
Mom's handbag and shoes are not exactly the same color, but they are a very close match.
It was a close match but the Seagulls won on penalties.

dsense.name: football match, football game (UK), soccer match, soccer game (US)

example.eg: Chelsea won the football game 2-0.
I'm trying to find two socks that make a match, but they all seem to be odd ones.

dsense.name: match point
dsense.guideword: (tennis, etc.: point that wins a match) (一方还差一分赢得比赛的情况)

example.eg: Federer only needed one match point to win the game with Nadal.
The match race between the two great horses took place at Pimlico Race Course.
I don't mind washing and ironing, but I hate matching up all the socks.

dsense.name: match [sth] up with [sth], match up [sth] with [sth]

example.eg: The students were asked to match up the French words with their meanings.

dsense.name: match [sb] up with [sb], match up [sb] with [sb]

example.eg: My mother keeps trying to match me up with her friend's nephew.
We were beaten 5-0 in the first game, so let's hope we do better in the return match.
Adriana won the singles match.
The spectators were enjoying the wrestling match.
